title: Jenkins and Jonez - A Ja Morant Appreciation Podcast
itunes:title: Jenkins and Jonez - A Ja Morant Appreciation Podcast
description:
The guys discuss the recent tear that Ja Morant and the Memphis Grizzlies have been on and where Ja stacks up in terms of most athletic point guards of all time. Then they discuss Chauncey Billups’s comments about Kyrie Irving’s unmatched skills, Klay Thompson’s return, Devin Booker’s beef with the Raptors mascot, and much more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
